description:
Bringing the deep flavours of a spicy pot of gumbo to your camp kitchen, AlpineAire delivers a dish worthy of a Bourbon street eatery. Tender pieces of grilled chicken are complemented with toothsome bites of okra, peppers, onions and savoury rice.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: precooked rice, grilled seasoned chicken breast with rib meat (chicken breast with rib meat, salt, potato starch, onion and garlic powder, spice), red and green bell peppers, onion, tomato flakes, cayenne pepper, potato starch, sea salt, okra, chicken flavour broth mix (maltodextrin, salt, torula yeast, dehydrated vegetables, potato flour, xanthan gum, spices, spice extractives, soy lecithin), onion, dried garlic, seasoning (yeast extract, salt, canola oil), celery, paprika, sassafras leaf powder (spices, sassafras), black pepper, green onion, oregano and thyme
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Creole Grilled Chicken Gumbo with Rice
